abstract: Prosecutors explain murder charges filed against Angelika Graswald at bail hearing in Orange County, NY, in connection with death of her fiance Vincent Viafore in April; Graswald had claimed Viafore drowned after his kayak capsized near Bannerman Island in Hudson River, but inconsistencies in her statements led police to believe she had tampered with kayak in order to claim $250,000 from his life insurance policies.
lead_paragraph: Some of the closest friends of Angelika Graswald and her fiancé, Vincent Viafore, cannot fathom how she could have killed him; an ex-boyfriend says he thought her irresponsible, not dangerous.

headline.main: A Kayak Trip on the Hudson, Ending in Death and an Arrest
headline.print_headline: Picture of Love Gave Way to a Charge of Murder on the Hudson

snippet: Some of the closest friends of Angelika Graswald and her fiancé, Vincent Viafore, cannot fathom how she could have killed him; an ex-boyfriend says he thought her irresponsible, not dangerous.
